posts.post_title: WTTF/WTB: T206s/T3's for St. Louis Scrapps
posts.post_content:
Hi,
Looking for a few St. Louis Scrapps. Condition is not as important. Looking to purchase and will also consider trades for certain T206's, T3's or woodcuts in my collection. PM's please. Thanks.

George
